| Overview                = The '''Hannanaki''' are a [[Homo neanderthalensis|Neanderthal]] tribe based on the [[Forbidden Island]] in the remote western parts of the [[Savage Land]],{{r|Savage Wolverine #1}} who were evolved by a [[Star Giant (Earth-616)|"Star Giant"]] to protect the machine preventing the awakening of the slumbering [[Morrigon (Earth-616)|"Dark Walker"]].{{r|Savage Wolverine #3}}

[[File:Hannanaki_(Earth-616)_from_Savage_Wolverine_Vol_1_3_001.jpg|left|thumb]]
[[File:Hannanaki_(Earth-616)_from_Savage_Wolverine_Vol_1_3_002.jpg|right||thumb]]
| History                 = 
===Origin===
In ancient times, the [[Star Giant (Earth-616)|"Star Giant"]] crashed into the [[Savage Land]] while clashing with the [[Morrigon (Earth-616)|"Dark Walker"]]. As the Dark Walker couldn't be slain, the Star Giant entombed him on what became the [[Forbidden Island]].{{r|Savage Wolverine #3}}

To safeguard the machine keeping the Dark Walker slumbering; the Star Giants evolved primitive hominids{{r|Savage Wolverine #3}} into Neanderthals,{{r|Savage Wolverine #1}} in order to protect the land, while creating the [[Mer-People]] to protect the waters.{{r|Savage Wolverine #3}} He set them up on the island with a group of [[Pterons|Reapers]] protecting the sky.{{citation}}

Across the ages, the Hannanaki and the Mer-Men slayed all intruders that stepped foot on the island: [[Roman Empire|Romans]], conquistadors, cowboys<!-- "Frontier dudes"? -->, [[Nazis]]... that came to the island.{{r|Savage Wolverine #3}}

[[File:Hannanaki_(Earth-616)_from_Savage_Wolverine_Vol_1_3_003.jpg|left|thumb]]
===Modern Era===
When a crew of [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] [[S.H.I.E.L.D. Geological Department (Earth-616)|Geological Department]], accompanied by [[Shanna O'Hara (Earth-616)|Shanna]], crash-landed on the isle, the Hannanaki harassed them for a month. They finally captured the last agent, [[Mike McSwiggin (Earth-616)|Mike McSwiggin]], as Shanna was away. [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]], coincidentally on the island, managed to rescue him on the way to their village, though McSwiggin expired.{{r|Savage Wolverine #1}}

While setting out to destroy the machine, Wolverine and Shanna the She-Devil encountered heavy resistance from the Hannanaki.{{r|Savage Wolverine #2}} During the fight, Shanna was killed by one of them, leaving Wolverine alone. Luckily for Wolverine, [[Amadeus Cho (Earth-616)|Amadeus Cho]] was also on the island and convinced the Hannanaki that he was their god and to help Shanna{{r|Savage Wolverine #3}} by using the life blood of a [[Man-Things|Man-Thing]] native to the Savage Land to resurrect her.{{r|Savage Wolverine #4}}<!-- to rewrite, complete, correct -->
